nodes.text: Gizer ale was a popular alcoholic drink known for its blue color and musky scent, developed on the planet Gizer. It also came in a lighter variety.
Senator Bail Antilles of Alderaan was known to enjoy Gizer ale.
Prior to their involvement in the Alliance to Restore the Republic, Han Solo and Chewbacca raced in a bet against the smuggler Reck Desh for fifty cases of Gizer ale, which they won.
